channel.title: Preparations on Practical Genomics Workshop
channel.description: Recent content in Preparations on Practical Genomics Workshop

item.title: Prep Work #2 - R Markdown and Unix
item.description: Learning Objectives Learn some analysis workflows Obtain data programmatically Use R Markdown documents to communicate analyses Practice manipulating genomics data using R Subset data.frames: one or more columns, a block of rows, rows matching a specific column Visualize data: boxplot, barplot, scatterplot Learn the Unix command line Tasks Install software (if not already done) Slack for troubleshooting help RStudio to provide a rich R environment (must be version 1.

item.title: Prep Work #1 - Swirl and base R
item.description: The registration form reserves your spot for two weeks. You must complete this assignment or your spot may be forfeited to someone on the waiting list. Afterwards, an additional 4-8 hours of work will be assigned each month leading up to the workshop (e.g.Â R and Unix tutorials, readings, software installation). Follow instructions at Swirl Stats Install R (must be version 3.4.3 or higher) Install RStudio (must be version 1.
